Package suncertify.gui

The GUI package contains all classes relating to the Swing-based GUI, both the server GUI and the client GUIs (networked and standalone client).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TextChecker Interface that has to be implemented when using the CheckedTextField to specify the constraints for the checked input text field.
ValidityChangeListener A listener responding to a change of validity of the text in a CheckedTextField.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTextChecker This abstract text checker class provides a default implementation for the TextChecker interface.
ApplicationLoader The application's entry point.
CheckedTextField Extension of JTextField that restricts the text being entered in a certain, configurable way.
ClientMainFrame The client main application window (network and standalone alike) with the menu bar, search panel, results table, and function panel.
ConfigurationPanel Configurable configuration panel providing the building blocks to compose the various configuration dialogs (in the case of the network and standalone clients) or integrated panel (in the case of the server).
ContractorTableModel The table model for the main JTable used to display the database records.
EditContractorDialog Dialog that displays and allows to edit the properties of a contractor.
NetworkClientParametersDialog An input dialog to enter the configuration parameters for the network client application.
NetworkClientView The view for the network client, wrapping the client main frame as the window actually being displayed.
PersistentConfiguration Provides read/write access to the persistent state of the configuration parameters.
ServerView The server view, managing appearance and functionality (listeners) of the server application.
StandaloneClientParametersDialog An input dialog to enter the configuration parameters for the standalone client application.
StandaloneClientView The view for the standalone client, wrapping the client main frame as the window actually being displayed.
Text Utility class wrapping mainly text constants (and some mnemonic dependent on text constants) for the suncertify.gui package.
ValidityChangeEvent Event that is fired whenever the validity state of a CheckedTextField with a registered ValidityChangeListener changes, either from valid to invalid or vice versa.
 

Package suncertify.gui Description

The GUI package contains all classes relating to the Swing-based GUI, both the server GUI and the client GUIs (networked and standalone client). Contains the respective integrated view-controller (combined) components of the application-wide model-view-controller (MVC) framework. In addition, this package also contains dialog boxes and various other helper classes as well as the main entry point for application startup.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lars Kuettner
